journal.name: Rate your knowledge: What do you know about self-regulated learning?
journal.intro:
Tell us what you know about self-regulated learning (SRL). Add a journal entry (about 3 sentences) of your understanding of SRL and tell us whether you consider yourself an...
- SRL expert--you apply principles of SRL in your teaching every day;
- SRL novice--you consider the principles and are learning more about the concept;
- SRL newbie--the term SRL and the principles are still new to you.
